comments: EDIT : I was able to cash out and it processed pretty fast. I was surprised. I'm $4 away from the cash out minimum, and my check list keeps glitching. I past the requirement on one game, but it didn't check it off. And I downloaded a new game and passed the requirement and haven't gotten it. Plus there is no way to let the app know when you have a problem with an offer. UPDATE I am at the cash out point, but it want me to do a facial recognition and it wont accept it or somthing.

The variety of available games is better than most other play to earn services. I haven't hit the minimum payout yet, which I believe is a little high (the reason for 4 stars instead of 5), but I have heard of others cashing out. You just have to make sure you read the instructions for each game, some have different requirements. For some you have to finish all the goals, others you don't. Some have different limits on how long you have to finish quests. Overall I'm happy with it.

Played the Monopoly all the way, it stopped tracking it partway through, tried to cash out, won't cash out, tried township, began tracking it but then stopped. The whole thing is a waste of time and a scam. They just want information, your information, so they can sell it. You get no compensation for anything. And all the games want you to do is purchase, purchase, purchase. If you're evaluating things you shouldn't need to purchase. I give it a zero if that was an option

I do love the concept of this app, is better (so far) than any of the other earth money apps I've tried. The goals for each game are realistic, and achievable. I would like checking my progress on the games to simpler, however. Other than that I'd recommend it to friend and family. I would've given four our five stars, but haven't completed all of my goals yet\cashed out yet. But that's because I've only been using the app for a few weeks now.

I didn't play because after install and email sign up, it's pretty clear that games within app require tracking install...not worth any pay out for me personally . Also if forgetting to click "agree to terms" the prompt text refers to the terms & conditions as "hint". I'll update this review if I begin to receive spam email. Many of these types of apps just seem to be predator apps on folks needing groceries or rent funds.

title: Wells Fargo Mobile
description:
Account Management
•Access your cash, credit, and investment accounts with Fingerprint Sign On¹ or Biometric Sign on¹
•Review activity and balances
•View your credit card transactions and manage your rewards
•Easily activate or turn cards on or off², add cards to digital wallets³, view recurring payments, and manage account access with Card Settings

Deposit Funds⁴
•Deposit checks using your Android™ camera
•Instantly view the processing deposit in your account

Make Transfers and Payments
•Transfer funds between your Wells Fargo accounts and to other financial institutions⁵
•Send and receive money with friends and family using a U.S. mobile phone number or email address with Zelle®⁶
•Pay your bills

Track Investments
•Monitor balances, holdings, account activity, and open orders for your WellsTrade® accounts
•Get real-time quotes, charts, and market data

Stay Secure
•Visit the Security Center to report fraud and maintain safe accounts
•Manage alerts⁷
•Get notified of suspicious card activity with alerts
•Access to your FICO® Credit Score

Contact Us
•Email appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com
•Locate one of more than 12,700 ATMs or find one of our approximately 4,800 branches
•Set up an appointment to meet with a Banker
____________________________
1.Only certain devices are eligible to enable Fingerprint Sign On or Biometric Sign On.
2.Turning your card off is not a replacement for reporting your card lost or stolen.
3.Not all smartphones are enabled to use a digital wallet. Your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply.
4.Some accounts are not eligible for mobile deposit. Deposit limits and other restrictions apply.
5.Terms and conditions apply. See Wells Fargo’s Online Access Agreement for more information.
6.Mobile numbers may need to be enrolled with Zelle before they can be used. Available to U.S.-based bank account holders only.
7.Sign-up may be required.
8.Some features may not be available on all mobile devices.

DEPOSIT PRODUCTS OFFERED BY WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A. MEMBER FDIC.

comments: so many hidden fees despite my account meets criteria. FED should close this pos bank down. I'm closing my account after wasting years with this pos bank. It is really hard to find your credit card history transaction and such. I hate this app and bank. So many clicks to see all your "deposits" in an account. Need to move the "filter" option to each account tab once selected for easy access. Unable to log one the first time, always take 2-3 times to log on.

I like to pay down my CC statement balance a couple chunks at a time, to keep my balance low and not impact my credit score. I really don't like how this app doesn't show the remaining statement balance, they just show the last statement balance. Makes it more complicated to figure out what the remaining statement balance is. The Amex app makes this super easy. It's a simple formula, please just add it to the app as a visual aid and a selectable payment option.

Horrible. Used to work fine for years yet lately for months now, wow, took many attempts to finally got in, always showed all kind of error message, recently said something like lets verify you in different way, really bad. I try to avoid using the app but I have to when depositing checks and it is sp frustrated. It is a big bank so we would expect good technologies but not so much at all.

For the last five or six months this app has become extremely difficult with the login process. EVERYTIME I log on it does the same thing. I go through the ENTIRE logon process only for it to make me start all over once I reach the six digit code that is texts my phone. Today it took me six tries before I could get to the home menu. Extremely frustrating to have to go through this EACH damn time. Fix it!

Now, it's October and the latest "features" introduced include not being able to transfer funds between accounts, view notifications, or pay bills. Last month, the new feature was an inability to take a photo of a check when using the online deposit feature. Wow! Reverse improvements. Here's an idea: howabout working harder on functionality. Maybe?

title: Remitly: Send Money & Transfer
description:
Join the millions of people who have trusted Remitly  since 2011 to send money to friends and family overseas. More money makes it home to loved ones with Remitly’s great rates, special offers, and no hidden fees. Use this easy money transfer app and your mobile phone to send money.

Transfer money using your bank account, credit card, debit card, with your mobile phone. Download our secure money transfer app and send money to banks and approximately 460,000+ cash pickup locations worldwide.

Safe, secure, fast: 
• Send money with multiple levels of security designed to keep you protected
• Have questions? Get quick support in our Help Center or contact us if you need to. We’re here to help 24/7.
• Get the exact date and time your money transfer will arrive

Save money: 
• Great rates to send money
• No fees to receive money
• Special offer on your first money transfer

Send money transfers worldwide: 
• Serving 170+ countries worldwide, transfer money safely 
• Wire funds directly to our mobile money providers, including M-Pesa, MTN, Vodafone, eSewa, GCash, bKash, EasyPaisa, GoPay, and more
• Send money transfers to our trusted network of banks, including Bancoppel, BBVA Bancomer, BDO, BPI, Cebuana, Banreservas, GT Bank, Bank Alfalah, Polaris Bank, ICICI, MCB, Habib Bank and more
• Send for cash pickup to approximately 460,000+ locations worldwide, including Elektra / Banco Azteca, Caribe Express, Unitransfer, Palawan Pawnshop, OXXO, EbixCash, Punjab National Bank, Weizmann Forex, and more
• Send money transfer to: Philippines, India, Vietnam, México, Dominican Republic, Nigeria, Pakistan, China, Ghana, Kenya, Colombia, Brazil, Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras, Nicaragua, Costa Rica, Panamá, Ecuador, Peru, Bangladesh, Indonesia, Korea, Nepal, Thailand and more

Remitly helps you send money worldwide and pay using your bank account, credit card, or debit card. More money makes it home to friends and family thanks to Remitly’s great rates, special offers, and no hidden fees. Remitly uses multiple levels of security designed to keep you protected. We’re here to help 24/7. Talk to us or search the Help Center for support in 15 languages.

Download the Remitly app and send your money transfer today. 

Remitly has offices around the globe. Remitly Global, Inc. is located at 1111 Third Avenue, Ste 2100 Seattle, WA 98101.

"Referrals must be new Remitly users and additional send requirements may be required for rewards to apply. Click here for program details." (https://www.remitly.com/us/en/home/referred-by-sender-discount-tnc).

comments: Wish I could give this app a 4.5 rating, it's nearly perfect. Any issues that come up are resolved very quickly by their staff. Sending money is very reliable as long as the receiving party doesn't have any issues on their end My only complaint with the app, is it no longer shows how much money I can send before running into the limits. Before it would show daily, monthly and 180 days in the profile section, but now that feature is completely missing. Please bring it back, very useful.

I am a long time user of Remitly. I am very happy with this service, but the newest version of the App is annoying. When you are done using the App, you can't shut it off easily. I swipe up, which brings up options on every other App on my phone, except Remitly. I have to swipe down, and bring up my phone's settings options, then go to my home screen from there. This needs to be corrected, like yesterday. Hijacking People's web browser is not a path to satisfied users.

I use Remitly often, and I appreciate the quick manner in which they send the money. I also like that their quotes to transfer are much larger than other apps. Recently, they have also added pix which allows me to send money faster to other people I couldn't reach before. I had an issue and was able to solve the problem with 1 phone call. Highly recommend this app.

Remitly was my to go app to send money, but lately, I am unhappy with the latest update. Although they changed the sending free from $3.99 to $1.99, the exchange rate is now very low compared to other apps/ places. I am honestly looking for another app to use instead of Remitly. Also, this app used to have the option to send money instantly, but now that option is no longer available.

I really liked remitly at first. It was easy to use and reasonable sending fee. The recipient received transfers within minutes in their bank account, but recently there has been problems and I'm needing to contact customer service. I paid the fee, but the transfer doesn't go through right away and the status is "In Progress". So what is the point of paying $3.99 for express when it's not express?! It's very inconvenient. I need to look for a new app to send money.

title: Providers: EBT, Mobile Banking
description:
Providers is the #1 rated EBT app for checking your food stamp balance. Plus, see all your spending in one app with Providers Card, our free mobile banking account.

Join the 5+ million people who trust Providers (formerly Fresh EBT) for a better way to manage their EBT, WIC, Social Security/SSI, other benefits, and debit.

You'll keep your family’s finances on track, get exclusive deals, find jobs, and save more money with Providers, the all-in-one money app.

TRACK ALL YOUR SPENDING IN ONE PLACE
Providers makes it easy to manage your benefits and debit in one secure app:
• EBT
• WIC
• Child Tax Credit
• Paychecks
• Social Security (SSI)
• Cash benefits (TANF)
• Tax refunds
• Savings

INSTANTLY SEE YOUR EBT BALANCE
Skip the call. Check your EBT and WIC balances and spending history instantly on your phone. You’ll save time and always know how much you have to spend.

WORKS IN EVERY STATE
Providers (formerly Fresh EBT) works with every food assistance program and EBT card in the U.S. Get your EBT balance for your Quest, ebtEDGE, ConnectEBT, California CalFresh, Texas Lone Star, Florida & Pennsylvania ACCESS cards, Illinois Link, MI Bridge, Oregon Trail, and all other states’ EBT cards.

FIND STORES THAT ACCEPT EBT AND WIC
Use our map to find the nearest grocery stores, farmers’ markets, and places that accept EBT (also called food stamps or SNAP) and WIC. Also find food pantries to get free food.

STAY ON TOP OF YOUR BENEFITS
Get regular updates on any important changes to your food stamps (SNAP), P-EBT, Disability, and other benefits in all states.

BANK EASY WITH PROVIDERS CARD
Providers Card is a free mobile banking account that’s exclusively available to EBT cardholders.
Your Providers Card account comes with a Mastercard® debit card for everyday spending and a virtual card that’s extra secure for online shopping and bills.

ENJOY EARLIER PAYDAYS
Your paychecks arrive up to 2 days early if you set up direct deposit on your Providers Card mobile banking account.


GET YOUR BENEFITS UP TO 5 DAYS EARLY
You can get Social Security or Disability benefits up to 5 days early if you set up direct deposit with Providers Card. That’s faster than other traditional banks. Plus, our Deposit Prediction tool tells you exactly when your SSI/SSDI deposit will hit.

STRESS LESS ABOUT FEES
Providers Card mobile banking has no monthly or annual fees. No overdraft fees. No account open, close, or inactivity fees. No additional transaction, maintenance, service, or any other hidden fees. There are also no fees if you take out cash at one of our 30,000+ free ATMs.

STAY SAFE AND SECURE
Your money and personal information is protected by best-in-class encryption and security features. Your Providers Card debit funds are FDIC-insured up to $250,000. Instant transaction notifications and 1-tap card locking keep you in control of your family’s budget.

FILE YOUR TAXES FOR FREE
Providers Card comes with a free tax filing tool called Providers Tax. It’s easy and secure to file your taxes from your phone. Maximum refund, guaranteed. Both federal and state returns are 100% free.

SAVE MONEY AND EARN EXTRA CASH
Get exclusive deals for EBT cardholders, weekly discounts, and local coupons to help you save money on your groceries, bills, and more. If you need extra cash, use our job board to find a new job or part-time gig.

–––––
Providers (formerly FRESH EBT) is not affiliated with the government. We access your EBT account information with your permission via state EBT systems. We compile information about government benefits from public websites.

Providers Card and its banking services are issued and facilitated by Sutton Bank, Member FDIC, pursuant to a license by Mastercard. Providers Card is separate from your EBT card and may be used everywhere Mastercard® debit cards are accepted.

STAY SAFE AND SECURE
Your money and personal information is protected by best-in-class encryption and security features. Your Providers Card debit funds are FDIC-insured up to $250,000. Instant transaction notifications and 1-tap card locking keep you in control of your family’s budget.

FILE YOUR TAXES FOR FREE
Providers Card comes with a free tax filing tool called Providers Tax. It’s easy and secure to file your taxes from your phone. Maximum refund, guaranteed. Both federal and state returns are 100% free.

SAVE MONEY AND EARN EXTRA CASH
Get exclusive deals for EBT cardholders, weekly discounts, and local coupons to help you save money on your groceries, bills, and more. If you need extra cash, use our job board to find a new job or part-time gig.

–––––
Providers (formerly FRESH EBT) is not affiliated with the government. We access your EBT account information with your permission via state EBT systems. We compile information about government benefits from public websites.

Providers Card and its banking services are issued and facilitated by Sutton Bank, Member FDIC, pursuant to a license by Mastercard. Providers Card is separate from your EBT card and may be used everywhere Mastercard® debit cards are accepted.
summary: Track your EBT, mobile banking, deals, coupons, benefits, and jobs in one app.
